articles.author: Desiree Murphy
articles.title: Paula Abdul sues 'American Idol,' 'SYTYCD' producer Nigel Lythgoe over sexual assault claims - Page Six
articles.description: The “Straight Up” singer is suing her former boss, claiming the longtime producer sexually assaulted her multiple times while filming the competition shows.
articles.content:
Paula Abdul is suing Nigel Lythgoe, claiming the American Idol and So You Think You Can Dance producer sexually assaulted her while filming the competition shows.
Abdul alleges in the lawsuit, filed… [+3975 chars]
